import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { postDog, getTemperaments } from "../redux/actions"; export default function Form(){ const dipatch = useDispatch(); const temperaments = useSelector(state => state.temperaments); const history = useHistory(); const [input, setInput] = useState({ image:"", name:"", temperament:[], life_span: "", weight_max: [], weight_min: [], height_max: [], height_min: [] }) function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); dipatch(postDog(input)) alert('New breed has been created') setInput({ /* image:"", */ name:"", temperament:[], life_span: "", weight_max: [], weight_min: [], height_max: [], height_min: [] }) history.push('/home') } function handleChange(e){ e.preventDefault(); setInput((prevInput) => { const newInput = { ...prevInput, [e.target.name] : e.target.value } return newInput }) } return (
